Summary: 5 Orange Spheres Heading South to North West of Orlando, FL.
trends: There have been 112 other sightings in Orlando
There were no other sightings in Orlando on or around July 4th 2009
divs: Sighting DetailsTypical July 4th evening with fireworks lighting the sky so at first I thought nothing of the lights. However, these lights were different. They were much higher in the sky and traveled along the horizon from south to north in a straight line. As each object got to a particular point they would slow down then disappear to the east. There were a total of five orange balls with the first three closer to each other than the last two. There was no flashing or pulsing in the lights just a large (though they could have been miles away) orange glowing light. I remained outside for about thirty minutes afterward but no other objects were sighted.
